description: 4. What are the signs and symptoms of a person suffering from Ebola?
title: 4. What are the signs and symptoms of a person suffering from Ebola?
content: A person suffering from Ebola presents with hotness of the body (fever).A person can also present with headache, body weakness, muscle pain, bone pain, vomiting and diarrhea, cough and sore throat. Some people may present with bleeding through body openings like eyes, nose, gums, ears and anus.
